title.narrative: The Blue Planet Fund - Climate and Ocean Adaptation and Sustainable Transition (COAST) programme

description.narrative: The Climate and Ocean Adaptation and Sustainable Transition (COAST) programme aims to improve vulnerable coastal communities' resilience to climate change and prosper from a more sustainable use of the marine environment. COAST will do this by: i) protecting and restoring critical marine habitats that provide coastal protection and support climate mitigation (e.g. mangroves, seagrass, coral reefs), ii) improving small scale fisheries management, governance and market linkages, and iii) unlocking more sustainable aquaculture production and uptake by coastal communities. COAST will form a key part of the Blue Planet Fund, a joint fund between FCDO and Defra aiming to protect and enhance the marine environment and reduce poverty.
